job.title: Software Design Engineer - C#, .NET, PLC, NPI, Robotics
job.description: With an office in Anaheim CA we are a Fortune 500 powerhouse that partners with some of the worlds best brands to develop and manufacture products that helps connect people and advance technologybrbrWe are looking for several topnotch Software Design Engineers to join our worldclass team You will be responsible for building turnkey complete solutions for our customers using the NET platform as well as industrial machine vision systems at times You will work with some of our partners to create and optimize solution implementations based on our customers specifications If this role appeals to you then please apply immediately as were looking to move extremely fastbrbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Scope design code debug and document software projects from start to finish with a team or alone internallylili Work with our software partners to create optimized solution implementations based on client requirementslili Work with vision systems in integrating vision applicationslili Develop and deploy very complex control systemslili Troubleshooting software and hardwarelili Travel up to 20brliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli 5 years of Software Design Engineering experiencelili Knowledge of Object Oriented Design amp Programminglili Advanced with Microsoft Stack and NET Platform specifically C and Visual Studiolili Experienced with machine vision systems such as Cognex Keyence OpenCV etclili Experienced with MS Access Database and SQL Programminglili Motion Control Systems and System Integrationlili Ability to trouble shoot software and hardwarelili Comfortable being client facing and working directly with our clientsbrliulstronguBonus Pointsbrustrongulli Familiarity of SEMI Standardslili Experience with TwinCat3 or STX programmingbrliulWhats In It for YoubrbrstronguBenefitsbrbrustrongFor your hard work and dedication you will be rewarded with a competitive base salary and excellent benefits including but not limited tobrulli Next GENERATION productslili Great Benefitslili Generous Vacation Planlili Paid Holidayslili Great work life balancelili MASSIVE GROWTHlili Work with the LATEST technologiesbrliulInterviews will be conducted this week and next week Apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrPatBefortCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  PB21643776  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulPat Befort  Recruiting Manager  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an
